text: Odd - I can’t copy snippets from a grouping in a custom module
Anyone else ever run into something similar? (Trying to use the group in a repeater in the module if that makes a difference)

Didn't saw recently but anyways, if you are using a repeatable group the snippet was wrongly generated, because they can't know the variable that you will use for that inside the loop
They could add tho, as default "item" so it will be like:
`{% for item in module.repeatable_group %}`
` {{ item.field_slug }}`
`{% endfor %}`
you have to copy the group itself
and get it that way - if it’s a repeatable you have to loop through or do some mapping or something to pull them out of the loop
Yeah, I logic’d it through in my head and realized that it MUST use the repeater’s chosen variable during the loop - thanks for the reply!
Having issues with DM2, Stuck on 'Saving...' and can't click publish, trying to edit a custom module.
Fix on the way for the saving issue. Thanks for reporting <@UATE4ATHP>
